p: Furthermore, researchers have found four important medical features combinations of clinical, laboratory features, and demographic information using GHS, CD3 percentage, total protein, and patient age employing Support Vector Machine as the primary feature classification model [30]. The new model is effective and robust in predicting patients in critical/severe conditions, and the empirical results show that a combination of the four-feature results an AUROC of 0.9996 and 0.9757 in training and testing datasets respectively. The survival and the cox-multivariant regression analysis revealed the model's significance towards and auxiliary tools for the healthcare expert.
